Bob Mueller: s tenure as FBI director under President Bush: The expert verifies that Mueller was nominated by Bush in 2001 and served as FBI director throughout the remainder of Bush's presidency until September 4, 2013.
Mueller: s longer service under Bush: The expert states that Mueller served longer under Bush, approximately seven years and four months, compared to his service under Obama, roughly four years and eight months.
Party affiliation of Mueller: s investigative team: The expert acknowledges that while the special counsel's office does not maintain records on party affiliation, the Washington Post reported that 13 out of the 17 team members are registered Democrats. The remaining four members have either no party affiliation or their affiliation couldn't be found by the Post's researchers.
